repnme.cdata!: Turkey - Elbistan Cignite Mine and Power Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The Elbistan Power Project will help
            finance the development of an open-cast lignite mine in
            East-Central Turkey by TKI with an annual output of about
            17-20 million tons and construction by TEK of a mine-based
            thermal power station with a capacity of 1,200 MW and
            associated transmission lines.

docna.cdata!: Turkey - Elbistan Cignite Mine and Power Project

display_title.display_title:
Turkey - Elbistan Cignite Mine
            and Power Project
